verses.verse: ה֥וֹי <WH1945> Woe אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> to the land צִלְצַ֣ל <WH6767> shadowing כְּנָפָ֑יִם <WH3671> with wings אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Which מֵעֵ֖בֶר <WH5676> which [is] beyond לְנַֽהֲרֵי־ <WH5104> the rivers כֽוּשׁ׃ <WH3568> of Ethiopia

הַשֹּׁלֵ֨חַ <WH7971> That sendeth בַּיָּ֜ם <WH3220> by the sea צִירִ֗ים <WH6735> ambassadors וּבִכְלֵי־ <WH3627> even in vessels גֹמֶא֮ <WH1573> of bulrushes עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> upon מַיִם֒ <WH4325> the waters לְכ֣וּ ׀ <WH1980> Go מַלְאָכִ֣ים <WH4397> messengers קַלִּ֗ים <WH7031> ye swift אֶל־ <WH413> to גּוֹי֙ <WH1471> to a nation מְמֻשָּׁ֣ךְ <WH4900> scattered וּמוֹרָ֔ט <WH4178> and peeled אֶל־ <WH413> to עַ֥ם <WH5971> to a people נוֹרָ֖א <WH3372> terrible מִן־ <WH4480> at ה֣וּא <WH1931> he וָהָ֑לְאָה <WH1973> from their beginning hitherto גּ֚וֹי <WH1471> a nation קַו־ קָ֣ו <WH6978> meted out וּמְבוּסָ֔ה <WH4001> and trodden down אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Whose בָּזְא֥וּ <WH958> have spoiled נְהָרִ֖ים <WH5104> the rivers אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> whose land

כָּל־ <WH3605> All יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> All ye inhabitants תֵבֵ֖ל <WH8398> of the world וְשֹׁ֣כְנֵי <WH7931> and dwellers אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> on the earth כִּנְשֹׂא־ <WH5375> ye when he lifteth up נֵ֤ס <WH5251> an ensign הָרִים֙ <WH2022> on the mountains תִּרְא֔וּ <WH7200> see וְכִתְקֹ֥עַ <WH8628> and when he bloweth שׁוֹפָ֖ר <WH7782> a trumpet תִּשְׁמָֽעוּ׃ <WH8085> hear ס

כִּי֩ <WH3588> For כֹ֨ה <WH3541> For so אָמַ֤ר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about [אֶשְׁקֹוטָה כ] (אֶשְׁקֳטָ֖ה <WH8252> appease ק) וְאַבִּ֣יטָה <WH5027> and I will consider בִמְכוֹנִ֑י <WH4349> in my dwelling place כְּחֹ֥ם <WH2527> heat צַח֙ <WH6703> like a clear עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> and א֔וֹר <WH219> sunshine כְּעָ֥ב <WH5645> [and] like a cloud טַ֖ל <WH2919> of dew בְּחֹ֥ם <WH2527> in the heat קָצִֽיר׃ <WH7105> of harvest

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> For afore קָצִיר֙ <WH7105> the harvest כְּתָם־ <WH8552> is perfect פֶּ֔רַח <WH6525> when the bud וּבֹ֥סֶר <WH1155> and the sour grape גֹּמֵ֖ל <WH1580> is ripening יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> becomes נִצָּ֑ה <WH5328> in the flower וְכָרַ֤ת <WH3772> he shall both cut off הַזַּלְזַלִּים֙ <WH2150> the sprigs בַּמַּזְמֵר֔וֹת <WH4211> with pruning hooks וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּטִישׁ֖וֹת <WH5189> the branches הֵסִ֥יר <WH5493> and take away הֵתַֽז׃ <WH8456> [and] cut down

יֵעָזְב֤וּ <WH5800> They shall be left יַחְדָּו֙ <WH3162> together לְעֵ֣יט <WH5861> unto the fowls הָרִ֔ים <WH2022> of the mountains וּֽלְבֶהֱמַ֖ת <WH929> and to the beasts הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְקָ֤ץ <WH6972> shall summer עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> of הָעַ֔יִט <WH5861> and the fowls וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בֶּהֱמַ֥ת <WH929> upon them and all the beasts הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the earth עָלָ֥יו <WH5921> and תֶּחֱרָֽף׃ <WH2778> shall winter

בָּעֵת֩ <WH6256> In that time הַהִ֨יא <WH1931> he יֽוּבַל־ <WH2986> be brought שַׁ֜י <WH7862> shall the present לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> of hosts עַ֚ם <WH5971> of a people מְמֻשָּׁ֣ךְ <WH4900> scattered וּמוֹרָ֔ט <WH4178> and peeled וּמֵעַ֥ם <WH5971> and from a people נוֹרָ֖א <WH3372> terrible מִן־ <WH4480> at ה֣וּא <WH1931> he וָהָ֑לְאָה <WH1973> from their beginning hitherto גּ֣וֹי ׀ <WH1471> a nation קַו־ קָ֣ו <WH6978> meted out וּמְבוּסָ֗ה <WH4001> and trodden under foot אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> Whose בָּזְא֤וּ <WH958> have spoiled נְהָרִים֙ <WH5104> the rivers אַרְצ֔וֹ <WH776> whose land אֶל־ <WH413> to מְק֛וֹם <WH4725> to the place שֵׁם־ <WH8034> of the name יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הַר־ <WH2022> the mount צִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> Zion ס
